mapper.update: UPDATE questions SET answer=#{answer} WHERE qno=#{qno}
mapper.select: SELECT r.bno, r.cno, GROUP_CONCAT(r.reason SEPARATOR '/') AS reasons,GROUP_CONCAT(r.reporter SEPARATOR '/') AS reporter, COUNT(*) AS count, COALESCE(b.nickname, c.nickname) AS nickname, COALESCE(b.content, c.content) AS content, title FROM report r LEFT JOIN board b ON r.bno = b.bno LEFT JOIN comment c ON r.cno = c.cno GROUP BY r.bno, r.cno HAVING count(*) > 2 ORDER BY cno DESC,bno DESC limit #{start}, #{amount};
select reporter,reason from report where ${type} like #{no};
SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report r GROUP BY r.bno, r.cno HAVING count(*)>2) AS sub

update.if: UPDATE USER SET baned = null WHERE nickname LIKE #{nickname}
